name: Space Pirates (JTB Games)
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam

THERE IS A GLITCH ON THE TUTORIAL WHERE THE ASTROID DOES NOT CONTAIN ANY FUEL IF THAT HAPPENS RELOAD OR RESTART THE GAME!!!

This game is hard.

You must defend your spaceship from the pirates.

the Space Pirates have broken you ships fuel reserves you must refuel it.

Shooting uses Fuel. to refuel your fuel place fuel generators/miners. Enemies will try to steal your fuel. if you run out of fuel you a stranded and you loose. If you can give your ship the necessary fuel it needs then you may survive. 

If someone can beat this on impossible my mind will be blown.

Controls:

AD to turn,

Space to Move,

Left click to Shoot,

Right click to place Fuel Generator/Miner
